n, k = map(int, input().split())

if n > k * 2:
    print("NO")
    exit()

if n == k:
    print("YES")
    print(*[1 for _ in range(k)])
    exit()

if n == k - 1:
    print("YES")
    print(*[1 for _ in range(k - 1)], 2)
    exit()

if n == k - 2:
    print("YES")
    print(*[1 for _ in range(k - 2)], 2, 2)
    exit()

if n == k - 3:
    print("YES")
    print(*[1 for _ in range(k - 3)], 2, 2, 3)
    exit()

if n == k - 4:
    print("YES")
    print(*[1 for _ in range(k - 4)], 2, 2, 3, 3)
    exit()

print("YES")

if n % 2 == 1:
    print(*[1 for _ in range(k - n // 2 - 1)], 2, 2, *[4 for _ in range(n // 2 - 1)], 5)
else:
    print(*[1 for _ in range(k - n // 2 - 1)], 2, 2, *[4 for _ in range(n // 2 - 2)], 6)

import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

if n < k:
    print("NO")
    sys.exit(0)

if n == k:
    print("YES")
    print(*[1 for i in range(k)])
    sys.exit(0)

if n > k * 2:
    print("NO")
    sys.exit(0)

if n % k == 0:
    print("YES")
    print(*[n // k for i in range(k)])
    sys.exit(0)

print("YES")

if n % k == 1:
    print(*[1 for i in range(n % k)], end=" ")
    print(*[n // k for i in range(k - (n % k))])
    sys.exit(0)

if n % k == 2:
    print(*[2 for i in range(n % k)], end=" ")
    print(*[n // k for i in range(k - (n % k))])
    sys.exit(0)

if n % k == 3:
    print(1, 2, 3, end=" ")
    print(*[n // k for i in range(k - (n % k))])
    sys.exit(0)

if n % k == 4:
    print(*[2 for i in range(2)], end=" ")
    print(*[1 for i in range(2)], end=" ")
    print(*[n // k for i in range(k - (n % k))])
    sys.exit(0)

if n % k == 5:
    print(*[2 for i in range(2)], end=" ")
    print(*[1 for i in range(3)], end=" ")
    print(*[n // k for i in range(k - (n % k))])
    sys.exit(0)

if n % k == 6:
    print(*[2 for i in range(3)], end=" ")
    print(*[1 for i in range(3)], end=" ")
    print(*[n // k for i in range(k - (n % k))])
    sys.exit(0)
